content.body: what are the odds we could get away with changing `String.prototype.indexOf` so that if you pass a regex it will actually use it instead of coercing to a string
content.formatted_body: what are the odds we could get away with changing String.prototype.indexOf so that if you pass a regex it will actually use it instead of coercing to a string

content.body: (I'm thinking something like, if the argument is not primitive then look up `Symbol.exec` and use that instead of doing `.toString`)
content.formatted_body: (I'm thinking something like, if the argument is not primitive then look up Symbol.exec and use that instead of doing .toString)

content.body: presumably someone is somehow relying on like `'foo/bar/baz'.indexOf(/bar/)` returning 3
content.formatted_body: presumably someone is somehow relying on like 'foo/bar/baz'.indexOf(/bar/) returning 3
